path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/USD SMART Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The owner can increase totalSupply by calling add() function and then distribute token amount, which is a kind of minting.

findings.title: Owner can burn
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to burn tokens, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw BNBs from the contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw BNBs from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw tokens from contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can stop distribution
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to stop token distribution.

findings.title: Owner can distribute tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to distribute token amounts, similar to minting.

findings.title: Owner can change tokensPerBsc value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tokensPerBsc value, which could lead to unintended consequences.
